content: {"name": "Church of God in Christ on the Hill Food Ministry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Primarily a soup kitchen, but may also distributes pantry items\n", "email": "", "url": "https://www.cogicoth.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "137 Buffalo Ave", "address_2": "", "city": "Brooklyn", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11213", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.674545, "longitude": -73.924637}, "phones": [{"number": "(347) 216-7681", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
